{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Squish | class = HereticSoundSequence2 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1201 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence2</u>
Plays sound sequence number 1 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence2</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 1 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Squish environment 1 slot [[HereticAmbience]] playuntildone world/amb2 end
